text: [chopping]
[jazz music]
Hello everybody!
I'm going on a trip around the world. I wanna
meet you and I wanna cook with you. Thanks to help and
funding of YouTube I've been planning my new
global cooking show. After some discussion on my
website and Facebook, the name of the show is...
"Maangchi Gapshida!"
"Gapshida" means "let's go." Maangchi Gapshida - "Let's go, Maangchi!"
Most people want this name. Thank you so much
for all your creative, brilliant suggestions.
Really surprised me. Someone said: "How about Maangchi Munchies?"
Another person said:
"How about Hammer Time?" because Maangchi means "hammer."
That's in Korean. And someone said:
"Open Sesame" because I used sesame oil in a few of my
videos, probably I must have said "open sesame." One person said
"How about Soondubu?" You know soondubu?
It's soft tofu. How come my show name is soondubu?
But anyway, I was laughing. Thank you for giving me L-O-L.
So, I wanna meet you, I wanna cook with you.
I wanna cook Korean food in your house. And also I want you
to teach me your everyday -- your food from your culture.
Your country. In Korea, everyday food is rice,
kimchi, soup... and doenjangguk, doenjangjjigae.
I really wanna know what is your everyday home
cooked food in your house. Please show me how to cook
your local food. We are going to make a video of this.
Everywhere I go I'm going to film two videos.
Korean food taught by me, and your local
food taught by you. If you want to meet me or if you want to
cook with me in your house please visit my website
and fill out the form. And also if you want to
just come to a meetup, so you should fill out the form. When we cook together
in your house, let's invite some other Korean
food lovers in your area. If we cook together in your house and we
do meetup together, I'm going to make a little extra food and we share
all share food together after filming. It will be so fun.
So already you have a YouTube channel and you make a video and you have
some the -- and you wanna do some collaboration video with me
fill out the form and then give me your idea. I have no schedule.
I don't know where I'm going to start filming or how many
countries, how long I will, it depends on where you guys suggest.
Let's make it together! I'm going to start filming September or October.
As far as I know, nobody's done this before.
Let's surprise the world with our food!
I'm very excited to see your submissions and to meet you.
When I have a plan I will make another video and I will let you know.
Ok see you next time, bye bye!
